subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The jockey Ramon Dominguez has been cleared to resume riding three weeks after separating his collarbone in a spill at Aqueduct Racetrack.
snippet: The jockey Ramon Dominguez has been cleared to resume riding three weeks after separating his collarbone in a spill at Aqueduct Racetrack.
